summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5104 for the improvement of Pike Street, from 1st Avenue to Melrose Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by repaving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 58682, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
